item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Great, now these pro-admin troll groups are actively promoting hatred of anyone whose opinions they dislike. Tapos sasabihin gusto ng unity. Please help to report this page/post Edit: Looks like the album was taken down. For the curious, the album had tagged a particular netizen from the academe and included images of his posts questioning some decisions of the government, with the hashtag #EnemiesForChange
